'''1.21.2 Pre-Release 5''' (known as '''1.21.2-pre5''' in the [[launcher]]) is the fifth and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.2]], released on October 16, 2024,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/minecraft-1-21-2-pre-release-5|title=Minecraft 1.21.2 Pre-Release 5|date=October 16, 2024|website=Minecraft.net}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.21.2 Pre-Release 5
|;prev
|277630|Recipe book is not updated when one of the available recipes is used
|277634|Arrows shot at walls when facing south sometimes end up vertical instead of horizontal
}}</onlyinclude>
